texts.name: Ye Ye
texts.biography: Ye Ye is the keeper of the Hulu Mountain and an animable expert in botany. Not long ago, a pangolin digged through the mountain and accidentally released the sealed evil spirits. The old man is now calling up the 7 Hulu Brothers to hunt down the evil spirits again.

specialty.description:
{Hulu Leaves and Hulu Flovers}

Increases Speed of any Hulu Leaves or Hulu Flovers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every level (rounded up).
specialty.name: Hulu Leaves
